channel.title: Posts on 2019-nCoV: Epidemic Reports
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on 2019-nCoV: Epidemic Reports

item.title: 2020-02-11: Epidemic Map for cities (2019-nCoV)
item.description: Updated: 2020-02-12 00:16:38 (UTC+08:00) Confirmed cases. The gray area in the figure indicates the lack of relevant data of the cities in this area. Click here for full screen display. 2020-02-11 Epidemic Data Sheet ( Cities )

item.title: 2020-02-11: Epidemic Mitigation Time Forecast (2019-nCoV)
item.description: Time trends and model predictions of confirmed cases across the country Our model shows that the national epidemic situation will ease on 02-23 (the number of confirmed cases will not increase significantly). On 2020-2020-02-11 there will be 1760 new confirmed cases and in total 44004 confirmed cases. National Epidemic Time Series Date Confirmed Suspected Severe Dead Cured Conf.+Susp. Incr.
